name: Last Code
description:
You are the Technical Supervisor of the ongoing interrogation. Right before the Day of interrogation you receive an anonymous letter stating that innocent suspects are going to die because of faulty Lie Detector machine. It is up to you to decide if you want to be loyal to your department or go with your feeling to save the innocents. 

There are 2 Endings depending on your choices.
PLEASE READ ALL THE IN-GAME LETTERS AND TUTORIALS CAREFULLY TO PLAY THE GAME AT IT'S FULL POTENTIAL.

This game is made prior to the Community Game Jam theme "The Game is a Liar".

---HOW TO PLAY---
See the pattern of the Binary sequencer and memorize the sequence. Green is 1 and Red is 0. Input the sequence and hit confirm to accept. 
For the gameplay input the value opposite to the shown sequence  to save the suspect. For example if sequencer shows 1101 then input 0010

---CONTROLS---
FOR PC AND WEB-
> ASDF - controlling the 4 binary input
> SPACE/ENTER - Accept the Binary Value
> ESC - Force quit

FOR ANDROID-
> Touch Input
